description: A disconnected household refrigerator.  General choice to store some perishables for an average family.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.
A disconnected minifridge.  You saw similar one in some luxury limousines.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.

Heavy and bulky fridge with little wheels for easier transportation.  Has a bunch of holders, which allow to to install it in a vehicle and be relatively sure it won't smash fragile items inside.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.
//: TrueMFG T-19-HC, scaled down to fit the size of vehicle parts (assumed to be 500L)
//2: original values: 686 * 623 * 1912 mm, 112 kg, gross capacity 417 L, 495 kwh/annual
//3: scaled values: 578 * 525 * 1615 mm, 67 kg, gross capacity 250 L, 296 kwh/annual

description: A disconnected commercial refrigerator with a transparent glass door, designed to store cold drinks and similar stuff in a grocery store.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.
//: Tefcold CEV425CP, 1980 x 595 x 640 mm, net capacity 347 L, 821 kwh/annum, 94 kwh
//2: door should be approx 11 kilo of glass

description: A disconnected commercial refrigerator with two transparent glass doors, designed to store cold drinks and similar stuff in a grocery store.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.
//: True GDM-35-HC-TSL01, 1998 x 1004 x 759 mm (because of technical limitations, only 1000L of volume, not 1522), net capacity 347 L, 2103 kwh/annum, 240 kwh
//2: doors should be approx 19 kilo of glass

description: A disconnected commercial refrigerator, one that is used in professional kitchen.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.
//: Polar UA030, 2150 x 700 x 810 mm (because of technical limitations, only 1000 L of volume, not 1219), net capacity 700 L, 351 kwh/annum, 40 kwh

description: Big glass chamber, designed to display different food in a multiple rows, while cooling it at the same time.  While you might not need to actually display any of your food, it cool the food as good as any another fridge.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.
//2: Interlevin CHOPIN 1000 FV-VP, 1300 x 1050 x 800 mm (because of technical limitations, only 1000 L of volume, not 1092), net capacity 600 L (dimensions are calculated manually, 775 * 775 * 1000 mm), 1205 kwh/annum, 137 kwh

description: A disconnected household freezer.  Great choise if you need to freeze some discount meat.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.
A compact version of an upright freezer, designed as a mobile solution for freezing food.  Perfect choise for your drinks at hot summer.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.

A compact version of a chest freezer, designed as a mobile solution for freezing food.  Perfect choise to put in your closet and forget for a year, but it's pretty tricky to pull anything digged with frozen perishables.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.

Heavy and bulky freezer with little wheels for easier transportation.  Has a bunch of holders, which allow to to install it in a vehicle and be relatively sure it won't smash fragile items inside.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.
//: TrueMFG T-19F-HC, scaled down to fit the size of vehicle parts (assumed to be 500L)
//2: original values: 686 * 623 * 1912 mm, 120 kg, gross capacity 417 L, 2066 kwh/annual
//3: scaled values: 578 * 525 * 1615 mm, 72 kg, gross capacity 250 L, 1238 kwh/annual

description: Hefty chest freezer, designed to store plenty of perishables for a minuscule amount of power.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.
//: Prodis Arctic AR350SS, 850 x 1030 x 750 mm, gross capacity 350L, 0.724 kwh/day, 30kwh

description: Heavy-duty upright freezer.  Big as closet, heavy as tank, probably can fit enough meat to feed an little colony for a week, but consumes power like a truck.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.
//: Infrico AGN602BT, 850 x 1030 x 750 mm (because of technical limitations, 1000L instead of 1421L ), gross capacity 745 L, 3365 kwh/annum, 384 kwh

description: A disconnected commercial freezer with a glass door, used to present different frozen goods.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.
//: Tefcold UF400VG, 1855 x 600 x 585 mm, net capacity 400 L, 2664 kwh/annum, 304 kwh
//2: door should be approx 11 kilo of glass

description: A disconnected commercial chest freezer with a glass lid.  Activate to deploy and connect to your electric grid.
//: Blizzard BDF32, 850 x 1030 x 680 mm, net capacity 320 L, 198 kwh/annum, 23 kwh
